casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Carl Ray POORE, Jr. 227P18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 23, 2018 Daniel Shatz, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Poore, Carl Ray (Jr.)

Glenn Gerding, Appellate Defender.

Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 23rd of July 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 23rd of July 2018."
